name: unixodbc
desc:
The unixODBC package is an Open Source ODBC 
(Open DataBase Connectivity) sub-system and an ODBC SDK for Linux, 
Mac OSX, and UNIX. ODBC is an open specification for providing 
application developers with a predictable API with which to access 
data sources. Data sources include optional SQL Servers and any data 
source with an ODBC Driver. unixODBC contains the following components 
used to assist with the manipulation of ODBC data sources: a driver 
manager, an installer library and command line tool, command line tools 
to help install a driver and work with SQL, drivers and driver 
setup libraries.
